src_original: u1.139ab/.mayūra^grīva^saṃkāśaḥ pariveśo niśākare/  u1.139cd/.vidyād rāja^sahasrāṇāṃ mahī pāsyati śoṇitaṃ//  u1.140ab/.narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca rati^harṣo na jāyate/  u1.140cd/.sarvatra śoka^cintā vā mahat tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//  ṛṣayaḥ santo deśān prakrameyur yataḥ/
tgt_original: 「參星生者，頸下四指中有黑疵，為性勇健爵祿具足。

src_original: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/  u1.144cd/.dṛśyeyuḥ para^cakreṇa dhana^skandho vilopsyate//  u1.148/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/  u1.149/.aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi prakīrtitāni/  yāni candra^sūrya^niḥsṛtāny anuvahanti/
tgt_original: 「富那婆蘇唐言井宿星生者，於左脇下當有黑疵，財穀具足而少智慧。

src_original: tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgula^pramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ (p.148)  dairghyeṇa jñātavyaṃ/  ekākṣagṛṣṭiḥ śīrṣa^mūrdhni eka^pāda^talaṃ bhavet/  catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ yatra saṃdṛśyate/  tad anyathā na bhavati/
tgt_original: 「牟尼今者，富沙唐言鬼宿星生，有最上相手中輪相猶如日輪，上妙端正髮相右旋，一切依住上身圓滿，能破煩惱為大導師。

src_original: nakṣatre yatra yo jātas tatra  tatra saṃkṛśyate/  u2 puruṣa^pinyaḥ  u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/  u2.1cd/.pinyo dakṣiṇato yasya lomaśaḥ kṛṣṇa^lohitaḥ//
tgt_original: 「阿失麗沙唐言柳宿星生者，胸有黑疵，好鬪犯戒難，與共住性多婬欲上七星是東方宿。

src_original: u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/  u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//  u2.3ab/.dṛśyate vraṇa;  evāyaṃ yasya vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/  u2.4ab/.maṇḍito bhoga^sampanno hrī^yuktaś ca^api sarvataḥ/
tgt_original: 「莫伽唐言星宿星生者，若胸若背而有小疣，是善丈夫能如法行而多財貨。

src_original: u2.4cd/.śūro vijaya^sampanno nityaṃ śatru^pramardakaḥ//  u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/  u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//  u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/  u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
tgt_original: 「初破求唐言張宿星生者，或臍左右必當有疵，多慳短命。

src_original: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/  u2.7cd/.dhana^dhānya^samṛddho hi jāyate svalpa^medhasaḥ//  u2.8ab/.tathā^eva puṣye jāto +asau dṛśyate vara^lakṣaṇaḥ/  u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//  u2.9ab/.ardha^pradakṣiṇāvartāḥ keśāḥ sarve hi saṃsthitāḥ/(p.149)  u2.9cd/.parimaṇḍalaś ca kāyena jitakleśo +api nāyakaḥ//
tgt_original: 「第二破求唐言翼宿星生者，臍下四指若見靨者，爵祿持戒皆悉失壞。

src_original: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/  u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//  u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/  u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//
tgt_original: 「阿薩多唐言軫宿星生者，臍關無下當有赤靨，性好作賊，諂曲少智聰明薄福。

src_original: u2.12ab/.nābhyāṃ dakṣiṇa^vāmābhyāṃ vraṇo yasya pradṛśyate/  u2.12cd/.pūrvaphālgunījāto +asau matsarī ca^alpa^jīvitaḥ//  u2.13ab/.catur^aṅgulato nābhyā yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/  u2.13cd/.uttaraphālgunījāto bhoga^śīlaḥ śrutodyataḥ//  u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
tgt_original: 「質多羅唐言角宿星生者，男女陰上當有靨子，為性純直而多愛欲復好歌舞。

src_original: u2.16ab/.vyañjane +api ca;  ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥpradṛśyate/  u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//  u2.17ab/.kugṛṣṭyā yasya;  ūrūbhyāṃ pinyo lohita; eva hi/
tgt_original: 「薩婆底唐言亢宿星生者，或男根頭或在根下有黃靨生，受性多貪，瞋惱大眾而無智慧。

src_original: u2.17cd/.ākīrṇo naranārībhir viśākhāyāṃ bhaṭo +agraṇīḥ//  u2.18ab/.vidvān śūro jitamitro nityaṃ saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ/  u2.18cd/.śriyā dhṛtyā ca sampanno +acyutaḥ svarupapadyate//  u2.19ab/.dvitīyagṛṣṭyām ūrubhyām aṅge yasya pradṛśyate/  u2.19cd/.śīlavān anurādhāyāṃ dharma^bhoga^samanvitaḥ//
tgt_original: 「蘇舍佉唐言氐宿星生者，從跨已下八指量內隨處而有赤靨生者，眷屬具足多有僮僕，位居卿相聰明慚愧，勇健謀決能退怨敵，常受安樂命終生天上七星屬南方。 「阿奴邏陀唐言房宿星生者，從膝已上八指量內若有小疣，持戒有法爵祿具足。

src_original: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/  u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
tgt_original: 「逝瑟吒唐言心宿星生者，髀內有靨，短壽貧窮犯戒少慈為人憎嫉。

src_original: u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)  u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//  u2.22ab/.pūrvāṣāḍhāsu jātasya pinyaḥ syāj jānu^maṇḍale/
tgt_original: 「暮羅唐言尾宿星生者，髀上當有小疵，此有福德而速滅門。

src_original: u2.22cd/.dāyako dharma;  u2.23ab/.uttarāyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ jātasya tilakas trike/  u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/  u2.25cd/.krodhano mandarāgaś ca prājño bhoga^vivarjitaḥ//  u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/  u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
tgt_original: 「初阿沙茶唐言箕宿星生者，膝蓋有靨，性好捨施，能知法道命終生天。

src_original: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/  u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//  u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/  u2.28cd/.dānaśīlaḥ smṛtiprāpto dayāpanno viśāradaḥ//  u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/  u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
tgt_original: 「第二阿沙茶唐言斗宿星生者，於右脛上當有青靨，性好鬪諍，人不依附而不信受。 「失羅婆唐言牛宿星生者，於右脛上必有兩靨，常豐爵祿受身無病，人所愛樂命終生天。
